name: Dividend Soup
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds celery root, trimmed, peeled and cut in1/2-inch cubes (3 cups)
1 3/4 to 2 3/4 cups liquid reserved from puree for pumpkin-squash
1 cup chicken broth, or as much as is needed to bring liquid to 2 3/4 cups total
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place celery root and water in a 4-cup measure. Cover tightly with microwavable plastic wrap. Cook in a 650- to 700-watt oven at 100 percent power for 14 minutes. Prick plastic to release steam.
Remove from oven. Uncover. Puree the celery root in a food processor. Scrape into a medium saucepan.
Whisk in pumpkin or squash liquid, and chicken broth if needed, cream, salt and pepper. Place over medium heat on stove and cook until heated through. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving, if desired.
